hero.title: Online Coaching. Real Results.
hero.subtitle: Science-based training, simple nutrition, and relentless accountability — fully online via Trainerize and WhatsApp.
home.blocks.title1: Build muscle. Lose fat. Keep your life.
home.blocks.p1: No crazy rules. Training that fits your reality, not the other way around.
home.blocks.p2: You’ll get exact steps for the next 7 days and direct feedback from Andre.
home.blocks.p3: Workouts, metrics, chat and videos through Trainerize.
about.title: About Andre Garcia
about.p1: I'm Andre — Online Coach, Bodybuilder and transformation specialist. I help busy people build strong, athletic bodies with simple nutrition and precise programming.
about.bullets:
• 12+ years training & coaching.
  • Active IQ Level 2 & Level 3 in Fitness Instruction/Personal Training.
  • Specialties: Hypertrophy, Weight Loss, Strength & Conditioning.
  • Coached clients in Brazil, Spain, USA, UK, India.
